constantValues: Represents the line details of a resource booking.

definitions.description: Represents the line details of a resource booking.

members.name: bookableResourceBookingId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the resource booking.

members.description: Unique identifier of the resource booking.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a name for the booking.

members.description: Type a name for the booking.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.name: traversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.name: bookingType

constantValues: Select whether the booking is solid or liquid. Solid bookings are firm and cannot be changed whereas liquid bookings can be changed.

members.description: Select whether the booking is solid or liquid. Solid bookings are firm and cannot be changed whereas liquid bookings can be changed.

members.name: duration

constantValues: Enter the duration of the booking.

members.description: Enter the duration of the booking.

members.name: endTime

members.description: Enter the end date and time of the booking.
